


Question: What is the broadcast address of the network 172.30.80.0 255.255.254.0?

Convert IP and Subnet Mask to binary:
  172.30.80.0 / 255.255.254.0

  10101100.00011110.01010000.00000000 / 11111111.11111111.11111110.00000000
  11111111.11111111.11111110.00000000
  10101100.00011110.01010000.00000000 - Network Address is (AND)

Wildcard = Subnet Mask inverse:
  11111111.11111111.11111110.00000000
  00000000.00000000.00000001.11111111

Compare IP with Wildcard using OR:
  10101100.00011110.01010000.00000000
  00000000.00000000.00000001.11111111

  10101100.00011110.01010001.11111111

Convert to DEC:
  10101100.00011110.01010001.11111111
  172      30       81       255


Question: What is the broadcast address of the network 192.168.44.64/26?

Convert IP and Subnet Mask to binary:
  192.168.44.64 / 26
  11000000.10101000.00101100.01000000 / 11111111.11111111.11111111.11000000

Wildcard = Subnet Mask inverse:
  11111111.11111111.11111111.11000000
  00000000.00000000.00000000.00111111

Compare IP with Wildcard using OR:
  11000000.10101000.00101100.01000000
  00000000.00000000.00000000.00111111

  11000000.10101000.00101100.01111111

Convert to DEC:
  11000000.10101000.00101100.01111111
  192      168      44       127
